# Data Attribution

This project includes data from the following sources, made available under
their respective licenses:

## US Cities Database

- **Source:** [kelvins/US-Cities-Database](https://github.com/kelvins/US-Cities-Database)
- **License:** MIT
- **Description:** Database of approximately 30,000 US cities with state,
  county, and geographic coordinates.

## Street Names Database

- **Source:** [StNamesLab/StreetNamesDatabase](https://github.com/StNamesLab/StreetNamesDatabase)
- **License:** Open Database License (ODbL) v1.0
- **Description:** North American street names derived from OpenStreetMap data.

---

## Open Database License (ODbL) v1.0

The street names data is made available under the Open Database License:
http://opendatacommons.org/licenses/odbl/1.0/

You are free to:
- **Share:** Copy, distribute and use the database.
- **Create:** Produce works from the database.
- **Adapt:** Modify, transform and build upon the database.

As long as you:
- **Attribute:** Give appropriate credit to the source.
- **Share-Alike:** If you publicly use any adapted version of this database,
  or works produced from an adapted database, you must also offer that
  adapted database under the ODbL.
- **Keep open:** If you redistribute the database, or an adapted version of
  it, you may not impose any technological measures that restrict the
  freedoms granted by the ODbL.

---

## OpenStreetMap Attribution

Street name data is derived from OpenStreetMap contributors.
